Family Friendly Adventures - Cypress Knoll Golf and Country Club Skip to main content Skip to primary sidebar Skip to footer Cypress Knoll Golf and Country Club Palm Coast, FL Email Us 386-437-5807 Book Now Book Tee Times Our Course Course Details History Rates Scorecard Instruction Photos Tee Times For Golfers Pro Shop Memberships Leagues & Groups Nine ‘n Dine Outings & Tournaments For Family Fun Instruction Driving Range Pitch ‘n Putt Our Wildlife Family Friendly Adventures Our Food & Drink The Player’s Club Lunch @ Cypress Knoll Private Events & Parties Contact Us Contact Us Gift Certificates Join Our E-Club Book Now Family Friendly Adventures Our motto at Cypress Knoll is Family Owned, Family Operated, Family Friendly! We love to encourage young golfers… $5/9 holes or $10/10 holes Youth Rate when playing with a full-pay adult Beginner golf lessons with Teaching Pro Jim Powers ( 302-542-7845 ) Putting Green and Driving Range open daily for practice Pitch ‘n Putt (Par 3) Course available We’re a participating Golf Course for Youth on Course with the North Florida PGA! Our facility is open to families for lunch 6 days a week or for family parties anytime. Take a Tour Plus, we offer private “behind the scenes” tours for Cypress Knoll residents. Especially nice for non-golfers, you can see the course from the inside looking out. It’s a great way to gain an understanding of how the course is managed, how the game is played, and if you’re lucky, see some of our resident turkeys, bobcasts, alligators, or hawks. Tours are offered on Wednesdays or Thursdays after 2 pm by prior arrangement only, for groups of up to 6 at a time. Please contact the Pro Shop (386-4375807) to scheudule your group tour. Homepage - Cypress Knoll Golf and Country Club Skip to main content Skip to footer Cypress Knoll Golf and Country Club Palm Coast, FL Email Us 386-437-5807 Book Now Book Tee Times Our Course Course Details History Rates Scorecard Instruction Photos Tee Times For Golfers Pro Shop Memberships Leagues & Groups Nine ‘n Dine Outings & Tournaments For Family Fun Instruction Driving Range Pitch ‘n Putt Our Wildlife Family Friendly Adventures Our Food & Drink The Player’s Club Lunch @ Cypress Knoll Private Events & Parties Contact Us Contact Us Gift Certificates Join Our E-Club Book Now Private Events When you book your event at Cypress, you book the whole venue. You get our undivided attention for the entire day or evening. Our entire focus is helping you and your guests relax and enjoy the occasion, the food, and each other’s company. Stop in today to see our venue or book your event! Events Info > Gift Certificates Need a gift for your favorite golfer? Give them the gift of golf! Choose from one of our standard or whimsical formats, make it for any amount you’d like, and your shopping is done! Certificates never expire, so it’ll be the gift that keeps on giving. Good for golf or any accessories they need. Learn more > Golf Vacations Looking for a stay and play deal in beautiful Palm Coast? We offer discounted hotel rooms with golf included (based on dates & availability), or private homes for longer stays. Let JMB Events & Experiences (Veteran-owned) do the work of organizing your trip; you just show up and enjoy! Book a Trip > Tuesday Night is Nine ‘n Dine Night! Our Tuesday Night Nine 'n Dine is a year-round 9-hole league where all players are welcome! A putting contest with cash prizes starts the fun, then teams of 4 play scramble golf. We end the night with happy-hour drinks and a 3-course dinner, all for a great price. Single players and/or couples are always welcome to join in the fun and camaraderie of our game. $45 gets you the game buy-in, 9 holes of golf, and dinner! Join our Nine 'n Dine! What They’re Saying All the hard work by the maintenance staff and owners is paying off. The course was in great shape yesterday. Fairways were firm and the greens were fast. - 7/31/2025 Course was in nice shape and the greens putted true! Cart guy was super nice, helpful and provided some local info that was very helpful. Lots of wildlife include a few Gator sightings! Will certainly go back again! - 6/3/2024 Course is in good shape. The only course in the area that still puts water jugs out on the course. Much appreciated in the heat. - 7/11/2024 Had the day off and drove down from JAX, it was an excellent decision! Staff was super friendly and informative, and a fun and interesting layout. Super value for the money and I'll definitely be back! - 7/21/2025 We enjoy any time we go golfing there. It is a friendly atmosphere. Course is in good shape! - 7/9/2025 Play our championship golf course today! Book Now Stay in touch by email for updates and offers Subscribe Now Footer About Cypress Knoll Purchased in October 2016 to prevent its closure, the current owners have invested their own sweat equity along with their dedicated staff to turn Cypress Knoll into one of the best courses in the area. You won’t find a friendlier place in Palm Coast. Coupled with the scenic layout, it is truly a magical place to play. Private Events & Parties - Cypress Knoll Golf and Country Club Skip to main content Skip to primary sidebar Skip to footer Cypress Knoll Golf and Country Club Palm Coast, FL Email Us 386-437-5807 Book Now Book Tee Times Our Course Course Details History Rates Scorecard Instruction Photos Tee Times For Golfers Pro Shop Memberships Leagues & Groups Nine ‘n Dine Outings & Tournaments For Family Fun Instruction Driving Range Pitch ‘n Putt Our Wildlife Family Friendly Adventures Our Food & Drink The Player’s Club Lunch @ Cypress Knoll Private Events & Parties Contact Us Contact Us Gift Certificates Join Our E-Club Book Now Private Events & Parties Seating for up to 90 people Perfect for any occasion Small details make a big difference Privacy if wanted… Weddings welcome! Business functions too View from inside the main dining room Deck is open View from the deck Meetings From small business/working lunches to club meetings to corporate training to business presentations, our dining facility in its beautiful setting can make your event special. Flexible dining options coupled with reasonable facility fees for renting the entire space are available. Private Events Whether it’s a Birthday, Anniversary, Shower, Memorial Service, Holiday Party, or other event… You deserve individual attention to make your event truely special. From 24 to 90 guests, Cypress Knoll is the place to book your event! Tournaments With the best greens in Flagler County, and a staff dedicated to making your group’s fund-raising tournament a success, you can’t go wrong booking your tournament at Cypress Knoll. Catering Options Click here to download our event planner with full prices! When you book at Cypress, you book the whole venue. That means you get our undivided attention for the entire afternoon or evening. Our focus is entirely on making sure you and your guests relax and enjoy the occasion, the food, the view, and each other’s company. Stop by or call for an appointment to schedule your event today! Contact: Janice Nickol (386) 793-0500 or Floridajfn@gmail.com Get in Touch Please enable JavaScript in your browser to complete this form. Instruction - Cypress Knoll Golf and Country Club Skip to main content Skip to primary sidebar Skip to footer Cypress Knoll Golf and Country Club Palm Coast, FL Email Us 386-437-5807 Book Now Book Tee Times Our Course Course Details History Rates Scorecard Instruction Photos Tee Times For Golfers Pro Shop Memberships Leagues & Groups Nine ‘n Dine Outings & Tournaments For Family Fun Instruction Driving Range Pitch ‘n Putt Our Wildlife Family Friendly Adventures Our Food & Drink The Player’s Club Lunch @ Cypress Knoll Private Events & Parties Contact Us Contact Us Gift Certificates Join Our E-Club Book Now Instruction Jim Powers, Club Pro, Life Member PGA Website: golf-instructions.com Teaching Techniques for Both Beginners and Advanced Golfers Jim Powers is a respected Life Member of the PGA with a rich history of developing golfers at all skill levels. His dedication to the game and innovative teaching techniques have made him a sought-after instructor for both beginners and advanced players.  With over 33 years of teaching experience in Ohio, Illinois, Virginia, Delaware, and Florida, he has dedicated his career to nurturing the golf swings of countless students, fostering their growth and development, and making a lasting impact on their golf journeys. Teaching Techniques for Beginners Fundamental Skills Grip and Stance : Jim emphasizes the importance of a proper grip and stance as the foundation of a good golf swing. Basic Swing Mechanics : He focuses on teaching the fundamental mechanics of the golf swing, ensuring that beginners develop a solid and repeatable swing. Short Game Essentials : Understanding that a good short game is crucial, Jim introduces beginners to putting, chipping, and pitching techniques. Progressive Learning Step-by-Step Instruction: Jim uses a structured approach to gradually build a beginner’s skills, starting with simple drills and progressing to more complex techniques. Visual Aids and Feedback : Utilizing video analysis, Jim helps beginners understand their swing mechanics and make necessary adjustments. Building Confidence Positive Reinforcement : Jim believes in encouraging and motivating beginners, helping them build confidence and enjoy the learning process. Goal Setting : He works with beginners to set achievable goals, ensuring they have a clear path to improvement. Teaching Techniques for Advanced Golfers Advanced Swing Analysis High-Tech Tools : Jim uses video and still pictures, to provide detailed swing analysis for advanced players. Fine-Tuning Mechanics: He focuses on refining the swing mechanics of advanced golfers, helping them achieve greater consistency and power. Mental Game Mastery Mental Toughness Training : Understanding the mental demands of competitive golf, Jim incorporates techniques to enhance focus, resilience, and strategic thinking. Pressure Situations : He simulates high-pressure scenarios to help advanced golfers perform better under stress. Course Management and Strategy Strategic Planning : Jim teaches advanced golfers how to plan their rounds strategically, including shot selection and course navigation. Adapting to Conditions : He provides insights into adapting to varying course conditions, such as wind, rain, and different types of terrain. Become the player you’ve always wanted to be… Contact Jim at 302-542-7845 to schedule an analysis of your game. Or contact the clubhouse at 386-437-5807 to ask to be referred for a lesson. Group Clinics… Not sure individual lessons are for you? Try our Group Clinics! Every Wednesday at 3:30 pm, with a minimum of 3 and maximum of 10 students, you can get a feel for where your weaknesses are and if private lessons might be for you. Each session is $25; sign-up by Tuesday noon each week by calling (386) 437-5807. Golf Schools… A more intensive, immersive experience… our golf school will really up your game. Comments from some former students: “Today was awesome! I feel like I’ve been rode hard and put away wet, but I learned so much!” “I really had fun today, never got stressed, and I’m very pleased with my progress.” “I’ve tolerated this game for the last 45 years, but now I can’t wait to get out there and practice and play, for real, and actually know what I’m doing!” “Thank you so much from the bottom of my heart! I really love this game and it’s all because of you!” To find out more or to sign-up for upcoming sessions, text Jim at 302-542-7845 with your name and best time to call. Nine ‘n Dine - Cypress Knoll Golf and Country Club Skip to main content Skip to primary sidebar Skip to footer Cypress Knoll Golf and Country Club Palm Coast, FL Email Us 386-437-5807 Book Now Book Tee Times Our Course Course Details History Rates Scorecard Instruction Photos Tee Times For Golfers Pro Shop Memberships Leagues & Groups Nine ‘n Dine Outings & Tournaments For Family Fun Instruction Driving Range Pitch ‘n Putt Our Wildlife Family Friendly Adventures Our Food & Drink The Player’s Club Lunch @ Cypress Knoll Private Events & Parties Contact Us Contact Us Gift Certificates Join Our E-Club Book Now Nine ‘n Dine TUESDAYS 3:00 PM SHOTGUN START Putting Contest 2:30 – 3:00 pm Nine-hole scramble, Putting Contest, Weekly prizes, Golf USA Cup points, & Fine Dining all in one night! Join us for Golf & Dinner, just Golf, or just Dinner! Golf & Dinner: $45.00 Golf only: $27.00 Dinner only: $20.00 Dinner includes salad, buffet dinner, soft drinks and dessert. Dinner selections change weekly. TO SIGN UP, CALL OR STOP BY…  (386) 437-5807 Scramble Rules: All golfers tee off; all subsequent shots are taken from the best lie. Teams must use at least 1 drive from each member of the team. For teams of 3, the extra shot must be taken in consecutive order by each golfer. On Par 3’s only the players first shot counts for nearest to the pin contest. Memberships - Cypress Knoll Golf and Country Club Skip to main content Skip to primary sidebar Skip to footer Cypress Knoll Golf and Country Club Palm Coast, FL Email Us 386-437-5807 Book Now Book Tee Times Our Course Course Details History Rates Scorecard Instruction Photos Tee Times For Golfers Pro Shop Memberships Leagues & Groups Nine ‘n Dine Outings & Tournaments For Family Fun Instruction Driving Range Pitch ‘n Putt Our Wildlife Family Friendly Adventures Our Food & Drink The Player’s Club Lunch @ Cypress Knoll Private Events & Parties Contact Us Contact Us Gift Certificates Join Our E-Club Book Now Memberships It’s about more than golf…it’s about a welcoming atmosphere and a friendly staff that makes you smile. It’s a dedication to making Cypress the best golf course in Palm Coast, so our neighbors feel that this is their home away from home, and our members feel special every time they walk in. Join Cypress and become a member of our Family today! Member Benefits 21 day advance Tee Time bookings Complimentary warm-up bucket before scheduled play Member Charge privileges FREE Members-only Golf Clinics 10% discount off all Pro Shop & Restaurant purchases (excludes clearance items and specials) 30% discount on Cypress Logo products 50% off any room charge for private events, based on availability Walk the course after 1pm for FREE GHIN Handicap Service included! Click here to view a Membership Application Click here to download a Membership Application Annual memberships run from January 1 thru December 31. Join anytime and pay a pro-rated membership through the end of the current calendar year. Membership does not include cart fees. Seasonal memberships (for non-Florida residents) are month-to-month for up to six months per calendar year. Membership does not include cart fees. 18-Hole Plans Individual Membership: Annual $2,100 ;  Seasonal $350/ per month Joint Membership (in same household) : Annual $3,900 ;  Seasonal $ 660/ per month 9-Hole Plans Individual Membership: Annual $1,620 ; Seasonal $300/ per month Joint Membership (in same household): Annual $2,700 ; Seasonal $525/ per month Primary Sidebar Course Details Golf Hours of Operation: 1st Tee Time: 7:30 am Last Tee Time: 5:20 pm Walking Golfers welcome 1:00 pm to close Pitch 'n Putt open 2:00 pm to close Restaurant Hours of Operation: Mon - Sun 11:00 am to 3:00 pm Wednesday Group Clinics 1-hour lesson with our teaching pros Wednesdays starting at 3:30 pm Limited to 6 students per instructor Cost: $25 each Register by Tuesday noon each week Tuesday Nine 'n Dine 2:30 pm Putting Contest / cash prizes! 3:00 pm Shotgun Start 9-hole scramble Register by Monday noon each week Local Weather Sorry - your browser does not support iframes. meteoblue Stay in touch by email for updates and offers Subscribe Now Footer About Cypress Knoll Purchased in October 2016 to prevent its closure, the current owners have invested their own sweat equity along with their dedicated staff to turn Cypress Knoll into one of the best courses in the area. History & Stats - Cypress Knoll Golf and Country Club Skip to main content Skip to primary sidebar Skip to footer Cypress Knoll Golf and Country Club Palm Coast, FL Email Us 386-437-5807 Book Now Book Tee Times Our Course Course Details History Rates Scorecard Instruction Photos Tee Times For Golfers Pro Shop Memberships Leagues & Groups Nine ‘n Dine Outings & Tournaments For Family Fun Instruction Driving Range Pitch ‘n Putt Our Wildlife Family Friendly Adventures Our Food & Drink The Player’s Club Lunch @ Cypress Knoll Private Events & Parties Contact Us Contact Us Gift Certificates Join Our E-Club Book Now History & Stats Cypress Knoll is a USGA Certified Championship Golf Course designed by Gary Player Come experience the unique difference of Cypress Knoll! Built in 1989, Cypress Knoll Golf & Country Club is now family owned and operated by husband and wife Doug Brown and Janice Reid. Along with our staff and volunteer crew, we are dedicated to three things: keeping the Cypress Knoll course open to the public for the benefit of all Cypress Knoll residents, creating a friendly and fun atmosphere for all our guests, and providing a golf and dining experience our members are proud to share with family and friends. Tees times are available everyday starting at 7:30 am. The nines are now as Gary Player originally designed, with the 2007-built club house located at the turn and available for drinks and snacks or a quick meal. Our driving range is the largest in the area, and is open until sunset year-round. A “Pitch & Putt” style Par 3 course is also open for play on all 18 holes, every day after 2 pm. Cypress Knoll provides golfers fantastic views, secluded fairways, vibrant marshlands, beautiful lakes, and magnificent wildlife around every turn. Mr. Player designed Cypress to be challenging but fair, requiring perfect club selection to place the ball away from bunkers, water hazards and wetlands. The course draws you in to the way golf was intended to be, providing a golfing experience unique to our area. Whether you play a 9 or 18 hole round, Pitch & Putt, or just enjoy lunch on our deck with the best view in town, we invite you to experience the difference at Cypress Knoll. Quick Facts Holes: 18 Par: 72 Length: 6532 yards Slope: 135 Rating: 72.4 Year built: 1989 Architect(s): Gary Player Greens: Jones Dwarf Grass Fairways: Bermuda Grass Season: Year round First Tee 7:30 am Primary Sidebar Course Details Golf Hours of Operation: 1st Tee Time: 7:30 am Last Tee Time: 5:20 pm Walking Golfers welcome 1:00 pm to close Pitch 'n Putt open 2:00 pm to close Restaurant Hours of Operation: Mon - Sun 11:00 am to 3:00 pm Wednesday Group Clinics 1-hour lesson with our teaching pros Wednesdays starting at 3:30 pm Limited to 6 students per instructor Cost: $25 each Register by Tuesday noon each week Tuesday Nine 'n Dine 2:30 pm Putting Contest / cash prizes! 3:00 pm Shotgun Start 9-hole scramble Register by Monday noon each week Local Weather Sorry - your browser does not support iframes. meteoblue Stay in touch by email for updates and offers Subscribe Now Footer About Cypress Knoll Purchased in October 2016 to prevent its closure, the current owners have invested their own sweat equity along with their dedicated staff to turn Cypress Knoll into one of the best courses in the area. You won’t find a friendlier place in Palm Coast. Coupled with the scenic layout, it is truly a magical place to play.
